FilePathRule.Name: (Default Rule) All files
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the local Administrators group to run all applications.

FilePathRule.Name: All files located in the Program Files folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run applications that are located in the Program Files folder.

FilePathRule.Name: All files located in the Windows folder
FilePathRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run applications that are located in the Windows folder.

FilePathRule.Name: Additional allowed path: %OSDRIVE%\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Platform\*
FilePathRule.Description: Allows Everyone to execute from %OSDRIVE%\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Platform\*

FilePathRule.Name: Additional allowed path: %OSDRIVE%\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scans\*
FilePathRule.Description: Allows Everyone to execute from %OSDRIVE%\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Scans\*

FilePathRule.Name: Additional allowed path: %PROGRAMFILES%\Microsoft Intune Management Extension\Content\*
FilePathRule.Description: Allows Everyone to execute from %PROGRAMFILES%\Microsoft Intune Management Extension\Content\*
